item.title: Configuration File: config.toml
item.description: This is the Engimo’s configuraion file ( config.toml ) file of this site: #------------------- # # config.toml # # # # Hugo configuration # # ------------------ # # Website URL baseURL = "http://example.org/" # english languageCode = "en-us" # Website title title = "STEM Notes" # build directory publishDir = "docs" # for smart copyright line, leave this blank and check [params.copyright] copyright = "" # Theme name theme = "engimo" # Engimo theme config disqusShortname = "" googleAnalytics = "" Paginate = 5 preserveTaxonomyNames = true enableRobotsTXT = true # generate robots.
